63.eng-name: Merits of the Helpers in Madinah (Ansaar)

hadiths.text: Narrated Qatada:Anas said, "The Qur'an was collected in the lifetime of the Prophet (ﷺ) by four (men), all of whom were from the Ansar: Ubai, Mu`adh bin Jabal, Abu Zaid and Zaid bin Thabit." I asked Anas, "Who is Abu Zaid?" He said, "One of my uncles

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنَاقِبُ زَيْدِ بْنِ ثَابِتٍ رضى الله عنه
chapter.eng-name: The virtues of Zaid bin Thabit (رضي الله عنه)
